subject: Vam
description_text:
Reference your email of 18/8/25 in which you offered a free Vam to 
replace the faulty control box you supplied. To date [almost 6 weeks 
later] I have not received the replacement or been advised that it ready 
to be dispatched. Frankly from a company as respected in the sim racing 
industry as yours this is beyond just dissatisfying. As it stands I have 
two Vam motors which are useless and a total waste of money. I can only 
hope this has been an oversight on your part and look forward to 
receiving the replacement.

Neville Roberts 1 Navajo St., Wilsonton. Qld .4350 Australia

conversations.body_text: Hi Neville Roberts,  Could you please let us know the model of your pedals? In the haptics settings interface, you can test both the motor and telemetry functions. Please make sure to set the VAM motor intensity according to the software instructions — this applies to SIMHUB as well. Otherwise, there is a risk of damaging the VAM motor.

Thank you for your quick response. I purchased the pedals through Ali 
express where they were just listed as Simsonn  pedals without a model 
number or name. They are silver and appear to be similar to the PlusX 
version.

The Vam motors are not attached to the pedals at the moment as I am 
unable to find the software shown in your email to configure them. Will 
that automatically show up in v2.09 of Simsonn Manager after the motors 
are attached or is there a separate program I have to download?

Thank you again for your assistance.
Hi Neville Roberts,  https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Sorry to take so long to reply but have only just installed them.

They are recognized in Simsonn manager and am able to test the 
vibration, they are also recognized in the latest Simhub version which 
tells me they are connected. I have configured the effects I want but 
the reactors do not show up in Automobalista 2 - the only racing sim I 
use. The Vibration intensity and frequency are set to recommended levels.
Hi Neville Roberts,     Please upgrade to SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0. We support the games listed on the right, while SIMHUB 9.9.3 supports over 100 games. You may refer to this list for comparison.

I am using v2.1.0 and was able to launch the game using push start in 
the game panel but I still don't get any vibration during AMS2. I have 
enabled the effects in the following manner Brake- abs, gear shift and 
wheel lock Throttle- speed,wheel slip, rpm and traction control. When I 
test vibration is there but I simply don't feel anything in game.

I don't understand all the symbols in the game panel apart from "push 
start". What do I have to do with Path has set, set path, top this game, 
and launch from custom path?

I also want to run Simhub to use effects other than the ones available 
in your program. Is it possible to run  Simhub and Simsonn manager 
together and if so how do I do it?

As always thank you for your assistance.
Hi Neville Roberts,    You can use SimHub 9.9.3 to add the SIMSONN pedals in the device settings, but do not open the SIMSONN Manager software at the same time, as it will cause a conflict.

Both Simsonn manager and Simhub [I have the latest versions] recognize 
that my Vam reactors are connected but the pedal plugged into motor1 on 
the controller does not vibrate [I've tried both]. I have also unplugged 
and reconnected  all leads and tried other usb ports without success.

Thanks again

Hi Neville Roberts,  If Motor #1 does not vibrate, please try swapping it with another motor. If after the swap Motor #1 still doesn’t vibrate, but the motor that was swapped in works normally, this indicates that the issue is not with the main controller port or firmware, but with Motor #1 itself. We can send you a new VAM free of charge.
I have done what you suggest andotor 1 still doesn't work so please do send another Vam. Thank you

I have tried what you suggest but whatever is plugged into motor 1 won't 
vibrate so please send me the free Vam you offered. My delivery address 
is Neville Roberts 1 Navajo St Wilsonton 4350 Queensland Australia.

Thank you again for your help

Hello again, I have not yet received the free replacement vam you 
offered1 month ago. In case it's needed again here's my delivery 
address.  Neville Roberts 1 Navajo Street Wilsonton Queensland 4350 
Australia. Thank you

合并来自工单1685  
      主题: Vam software  
      描述:  I have downloaded Simsonn Manager v2.09 but there does not appear to be  anywhere to configure the vam motors I have purchased to attach to my  Simsonn pedals.  Your help would be much appreciated.  Nev
ID 为 1685 的工单已合并到此工单。

Hi Neville Roberts,  Hello, we sincerely apologize for the oversight. After the National Day holiday, on October 9th, we will arrange this for you right away. Sometimes instructions from customers may get missed by the operations team — thank you for your understanding. Could you please confirm whether you are using the PlusX pedals or the ProX Ultra pedals? We’ve recently released an updated VAM vibration algorithm with significantly improved performance, and we’d be happy to provide you with a test version if you’d like to try it.

Thank you for your quick reply. I am using the PlusX pedals and would be 
happy to try your updated version but will be happy for you to supply 
which ever version is most suitable for my pedals.

Hi Neville Roberts,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our vacation. We are preparing to resend two VAMs to you. Please provide the order number for your VAM purchase. Thank you.

I hope you had a pleasant vacation. Sorry but I don't have the order 
number for my Vam purchase but I do have a receipt for my purchase of 
the controller. The order ID on the receipt is rKVYPdu6JJokjfUHeE3rJ071v 
I hope that is sufficient. Thank you.
Hi Neville Roberts,    May I ask which platform you purchased it from?

Hello again,

I purchased the 2 motor and power supply Vam package from AliExpress and 
the controller from you. The controller was purchased on the 9th of July 
but because of health issues the system wasn't installed until several 
weeks after the controller was purchased.
Hi Neville Roberts,    It seems that the oversight was on our side.  Please provide your VAM order number, contact name, address, and phone number so that we can send you two replacement units.

Hello once more,

My details as follows, Neville Roberts 1 Navajo St., Wilsonton. 
Queensland. 4350 Australia. Telephone 0423 474 917. As previously 
mentioned I don't have a VAM order number Thank you.

As requested, I'm trying to send a message to your store via AliExpress 
but cannot get the required captcha to line up and therefore cannot send 
the message. However I have now found the order numbers for both my 
pedals and the VAM. Pedals 8197595652523810 VAM 8201822971173810 the 
controller order ID was given in a previous email. I hope this matter 
can now be finally resolved. Once again my delivery details. Neville 
Roberts 1 Navajo Street WILSONTON Qld 4350 Phone 0423 474 917. Thank 
you. Neviile Roberts

If you read through all my emails you will see that I bought the 
controller from you and have already supplied the order id 
rKVYPdu6JJokjfUHeE3rJQ71v. The purchase was made on July 9th this year. 
After installing the motors and controller the motors worked briefly 
then stopped even though they are still recognized by both Simsonn 
manager and Simhub. I followed the instructions given by you after first 
reporting the issue but nothing solved the problem, I don't know whether 
the problem is with the controller or the motors. But as you have 
already admitted that something is faulty and offered a replacement can 
we please get this issue resolved. It has gone on far too long. Thank 
You Neville Roberts.

If you read all my emails you will see that I purchased the controller 
from you on the 9th July this year and that I have already supplied you 
with the order ID rKVYPdu6JJokjfUHeE3rJ071v. After installing the motors 
and controller the motors worked briefly then stopped although they are 
still recognized by Simsonn Manager and Simhub. I followed all the 
instructions I received from you when I first reported the issue but 
nothing solved the problem. I don't know whether it's the motors or the 
controller which is at fault but as you have already acknowledged that 
something is faulty and offered a replacement can we please get this 
issue resolved. It has gone on far too long. Thsank you. Neville Roberts

Since my last email 11 days ago [to which I have not received a reply] I 
have been able to confirm that 2 of the motors are definitely faulty. My 
racing platform doesn't have a clutch so I replaced one of the 
originally installed motors with the spare one and it works perfectly. 
The other two will not vibrate. Could you please confirm that you are 
sending me the replacement VAM you originally offered. Thank You Neville 
Roberts.

Offer accepted thank you. My delivery details are Neville Roberts 1 
Navajo Street Wilsonton Queensland 4350 Australia phone 0423 474 917
